adjectives.description: boreable (comparative more boreable, superlative most boreable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being bored or drilled into.
Capable of being bored, or made to lose interest in something.
examples: Some factory workers are intolerably bored by monotonous tasks; others prefer them. The boreable, on the other hand, develop on occasion the most furious initiative in their efforts to escape boredom.
